title: TV producer Shonda Rhimes discusses three of the most beautiful things in her life
description:
(4 Aug 2017) ASSOCIATED PRESS
Newark, New Jersey, 1 April 2016
1. TV producer Shonda Rhimes and daughter Harper at the Black Girls Rock celebration
ASSOCIATED PRESS
Los Angeles, 10 July 2017
2. SOUNDBITE (English) Shonda Rhimes, TV producer:
"Three things I think are beautiful: I think my family is beautiful, and I think my family is beautiful because they are a clear source of what is important in my life -- like, there's no way to get caught up in any of the trappings of what's glamorous or what's frivolous or what's ridiculous.  They are just pure love and they are beautiful for that reason."
ASSOCIATED PRESS
Newark, New Jersey, 1 April 2016
3. TV producer Shonda Rhimes and daughter Harper pose for photographers at the Black Girls Rock celebration
ASSOCIATED PRESS
New York, 3 November 2016
4. Tilt down TV producer Shonda Rhimes poses for photographers at the International Emmy Awards
ASSOCIATED PRESS
Los Angeles, 10 July 2017
5. SOUNDBITE (English) Shonda Rhimes, TV producer:
"Number two: I would say - and this is crazy - but being trapped in a library filled with books is absolutely beautiful.  That's never going to happen to me, unfortunately, but being trapped in a giant library filled with endless books would be absolutely beautiful, mainly because it's filled with stories and knowledge and time and imagination."
ASSOCIATED PRESS
New York, 2 May 2017
6. Still image: TV producer Shonda Rhimes at the Planned Parenthood 100th Anniversary Gala
ASSOCIATED PRESS
Los Angeles, 10 July 2017
7. SOUNDBITE (English) Shonda Rhimes, TV producer:
"Three: I think that activism is beautiful, and I think that anybody who's willing to sort of stand up and put themselves on the line for anything that they believe in that strongly is beautiful.  You know, I was watch...  I was watching Anthony Romero who runs the ACLU talk, and I got to say I think he is the most beautiful man on the planet simply because of what he's willing to do: those kinds of actions, those kinds of people who are willing to stand up and fight for people who can't fight for themselves, I find them absolutely beautiful. "
ASSOCIATED PRESS
New York, 3 November 2016
8. TV producer Shonda Rhimes poses for photographers at the International Emmy Awards


You can license this story through AP Archive: http://www.aparchive.com/metadata/youtube/f823bcee0945b3c25322becccbb100d4 
Find out more about AP Archive: http://www.aparchive.com/HowWeWork
